ygData.subject: RE: Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!
ygData.msgSnippet: heh heh, that d be me!  Made my fourth piece of Shaman armor a few days ago. Their armor quests are easy, but lamely give no xp for completion.  Good thing I
ygData.messageBody:
heh heh, that'd be me! Made my fourth piece of Shaman armor a few days ago.
Their armor quests are easy, but lamely give no xp for completion. Good
thing I am making a profit on the pieces. I got almost a full bubble for
the crafted quest I did a couple levels ago, wonder why the shaman quests do
not give xp? Oh well back to questing, reading emails from home is
painfully slow over pcanywhere. Happy Holidays!

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 22, 1999 10:04 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> "WTB: Banded Armor will pay lots"
> - and sadly this last guy gets no answers

Well, when it's a L35 shaman shouting for the banded, you wonder
who's been doing a bit of questing recently. ;)

That's all banded seems to be used for now-a-days.

Harmonic.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
